title: Please Fix the connection issues since the last patch
body: Hey ever since the last patch I randomly get the unable to connect, please check your network connection ect. Sometimes retrying works, other times I have to restart the client 3-4 times before it connects... It is not a problem with my internet as I am using it to type this/listen to music on youtube with no issues. It lets me connect to the main client ok, it's just when I go to get in a game it goes to a black screen and tells me that it cannot connect.

replies.body: OK so... I can connect to custom games absolutely fine, bot games or pvp still give me a connection error.

> [{quoted}](name=Kremblin89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dKTPJnoB,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-02T01:32:12.466+0000)
>
> OK so... I can connect to custom games absolutely fine, bot games or pvp still give me a connection error. Unfortunately this means that I have to try to play with other players to see if I can connect ><
Now it worked fine for 3 days, then today it started again.
OK so it worked fine for 2 bot matches.... try pvp and its not letting me connect again. ><

I have done everything in that guide before, it was my first step when I started having problems. The thing is though it happens at random so I can't tell if anything I am doing is actually having an effect. It also seems to happen more often after 5-6 pm EST, eg I can play throughout the day then after dinner ect is when I start having connection issues. It only happens with LoL, if I use pingtest it shows no packet loss or anything to multiple other servers.

Because patches only change local files inside your League directory, they're *very unlikely* to affect your connection. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting.

Let me know if you have any further issues after working through those steps.
